name: Scavenia Survivors
description:
• Supports mouse, keyboard, controller, and touch screen.
  • Can be played offline, doesn't require an active internet connection.
  • Every new run will reward you with a new hero or permanent perk.
  • Different weapons for different play styles available to acquire and level up.

Constant Game Updates

We are committed to keep adding new content to improve the game, with at least one update per week.
